# How to Flash Geepas GTB7X2003G with MT6572 4.4.2 Firmware
 
If you are looking for a way to flash your Geepas GTB7X2003G tablet with the latest MT6572 4.4.2 firmware, you have come to the right place. In this article, we will show you how to download and install the flash file for your device and fix any software issues you may have.
 
## Geepas GTB7X2003G Flash File MT6572 4.4.2 Firmware 1000% Tested


[**Download**](https://venemena.blogspot.com/?download=2tMjnA)

 
Flashing your Geepas GTB7X2003G with the MT6572 4.4.2 firmware can help you to restore your device to its original state, remove any viruses or malware, fix bootloop or hang on logo problems, update your system, and improve your device's performance and stability.
 
However, flashing your device also involves some risks, such as losing your data, voiding your warranty, or bricking your device. Therefore, before you proceed with the flashing process, make sure you have backed up all your important data and followed the instructions carefully.
 
## Requirements for Flashing Geepas GTB7X2003G with MT6572 4.4.2 Firmware
 
To flash your Geepas GTB7X2003G with the MT6572 4.4.2 firmware, you will need the following:
 
- A Windows PC or laptop.
- A USB cable to connect your device to your PC.
- A fully charged battery or at least 50% of battery life.
- The Geepas GTB7X2003G flash file MT6572 4.4.2 firmware 1000% tested, which you can download from [here](https://www.flashfile.net/geepas-gtb7x2003g-flash-file-mt6572-442-firmware-1000-tested/).
- The SP Flash Tool software, which you can download from [here](https://spflashtool.com/).
- The MediaTek USB VCOM drivers, which you can download from [here](https://androidmtk.com/download-mtk-usb-all-drivers).

## Steps to Flash Geepas GTB7X2003G with MT6572 4.4.2 Firmware
 
Once you have downloaded and extracted all the files you need, follow these steps to flash your Geepas GTB7X2003G with the MT6572 4.4.2 firmware:

1. Install the MediaTek USB VCOM drivers on your PC.
2. Run the SP Flash Tool as administrator.
3. Click on the "Download" tab and then click on the "Scatter-loading" button.
4. Browse and select the scatter file from the Geepas GTB7X2003G flash file folder.
5. Make sure all the boxes are checked and then click on the "Download" button.
6. Turn off your device and remove the battery if possible.
7. Connect your device to your PC via USB cable while holding the volume down or volume up button.
8. The flashing process will start automatically and you will see a green circle when it is completed.
9. Disconnect your device and reinsert the battery if removed.
10. Turn on your device and enjoy the new firmware.

## Conclusion
 
In this article, we have shown you how to flash your Geepas GTB7X2003G with the MT6572 4.4.2 firmware using the SP Flash Tool and the Geepas GTB7X2003G flash file MT6572 4.4.2 firmware 1000% tested.
